      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(java.lang.String location)
        Do we ever need to change an individual location? It's set by a parameter on creation. I think it should be immutable afterwards, and so we should not have a setter for it. Thoughts?
        Parameters:
        location: - the location to set. TODO perhaps delete?
